configValue.name: mitre-attack
configValue.description: Adversarial Tactics, Techniques, and Common Knowledge (ATT&CKâ„¢) is a threat modeling methodology and suite of models for the various phases of an adversary's lifecycle and platforms that are known to be targeted by cyber threats. ATT&CK models are useful for understanding security risk against known adversary behavior, for planning security improvements, and verifying defenses work as expected.
